author: Aarti Iyengar
title: Time to DITCH red girls! Deepika Padukone, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Priyanka Chopra show you how to flaunt colours this Valentine’s Day
text: Alia Bhatt Time to DITCH red girls… Time to DITCH red girls! Deepika Padukone, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Priyanka Chopra show you how to flaunt colours this Valentine’s Day Here are some style tips by Priyanka Chopra, Deepika Padukone, Alia Bhatt, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Kangana Ranaut and more to help you get the perfect date look. P.s. ditch red! By Aarti Iyengar | Published: February 14, 2017 9:20 am
